alert.note: Alert for Caruthers - San Joaquin - Selma; Los Banos - Dos Palos; West Side Mountains north of 198; West Side of Fresno and Kings Counties (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 4:48PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT WEST CENTRAL FRESNO COUNTY THROUGH 515 PM PDT... At 447 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cantua Creek, or 34 miles southwest of Fresno, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Cantua Creek and Five Points. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Caruthers - San Joaquin - Selma; Los Banos - Dos Palos; West Side Mountains north of 198; West Side of Fresno and Kings Counties
